overview: Most men consider the widow Kate Bennington to be irresistible, but when she dives into a madly passionate love affair with a mysterious younger man, one of her secret admirers sets in motion a terrifying plan to end their relationship, forever.

production_companies.name: Bruce Lansbury, Edgar Lansbury Productions Inc

tagline: Most men find Kate Bennington irresistible . . . but which one is plotting to kill her ?
title: A Stranger Waits
